name: Skeleton Words 17 Online Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: LLGL (Unlawful, illicit)
NGH (Just adequately)
TRQS (A colour)
DBL (Loud enough to be heard)
LSR (A time or opportunity for ease or relaxation)
SPRN (A white crystalline compound widely used in the form of tablets to relieve pain)
NSNC (A person or thing that causes annoyance or bother)
BR (A writing desk with pigeonholes and drawers or in America a chest of drawers)
NN (In a short time, soon)
HT (An independent nation occupying the west part of the island of Hispaniola in the Caribbean)
ZT (The sixth letter of the Greek alphabet)
DBLN (A former Spanish gold coin)
NTRG (To make interested or curious)
DG (In music, a movement or piece to be performed slowly)
WN (The German name for Vienna)
NRLG (Severe spasmodic pain along the course of one or more nerves)
SRR (A person who lends funds at an exorbitant rate of interest)
VVRM (A place where live animals are kept under natural conditions for study or research)
VMR (The thin flat bone forming part of the separation between the nasal passages in mammals)
STCHN (A tube that connects the middle ear with the nasopharynx)
LNGR (Physical or mental laziness or weariness)
PHLGY (The branch of zoology that is concerned with the study of snakes)
VXLLLGY (The study and collection of information about flags)
MMTPHR (A movable stalk or tentacle bearing an eye such as on a crab or snail)
NNCH (A landlocked variety of Atlantic salmon found in lakes in south-east Canada)
questions.explanation:
Ouananiche.

	Hope you enjoyed this tricky quiz.
